items.sentence: Instead of saying anything, I decided to keep quiet.
The facts are just the reverse of what Tom told you.
This was Tom's third offense, so he was put in jail.
Tom walked down the corridor and into Mary's office.
Tom tried to pass off an imitation for the original.
Tom had to climb the pole to fix the telephone wire.
I started keeping a diary in French three years ago.
Would it be OK if I continued doing this my own way?
Have you ever experienced anything like this before?
Have you ever thought about why that doesn't happen?
